name: Tania
description:
Tania has to go back to the town she grew up in. She feels like her life in the city is gone. Follow her trying to mend fences with her past and her present. And maybe, who knows, she'll meet somebody new.

Gameplay video: https://youtu.be/oDdvjSuoaIQ

Credits: Art from UE4 Marketplace (Polygon City, Polygon Town). Music: bensound.com, freesound.org, twinmusicom.org. Font: Baloo Da 2, Google Fonts.
